Examples

(default)

<script>addBackToTop()</script>



<script>addBackToTop({
  diameter: 56,
  backgroundColor: 'rgb(255, 82, 82)',
  textColor: '#fff'
})</script>



<script>addBackToTop({
  diameter: 40,
  backgroundColor: '#ddd',
  textColor: 'red'
})</script>



<script>addBackToTop({
  backgroundColor: '#fff',
  innerHTML: 'Back to Top',
  textColor: '#333'
})</script>
<style>
  #back-to-top {
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 0;
    font-family: sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    width: 100px;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 30px;
    height: 30px;
  }
</style>



<script>addBackToTop({
  backgroundColor: '#ffda0c',
  innerHTML: '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M4 12l1.41 1.41L11 7.83V20h2V7.83l5.58 5.59L20 12l-8-8-8 8z"/></svg>',
  textColor: '#96071f'
})</script>
